chunk_text: ● The time allowed is from 9 AM until 10 PM. The actual ceremony and reception time is usually 5 hours. You have until 11 PM to remove your property from the venue. After 11 PM, a $750 per hour fee will be charged by the quarter hour and taken from the security deposit. ● Weddings on Thursday or Sunday will be discounted by $500 off chapel or outdoor packages, $1000 discount off of platinum package. ● A 25% discount is available to micro weddings between 2-49 people.
